data.displayName: Amber Small Business Plan Demand (Large Usage)

fees.description: Membership of $200 per month (inc. GST) to access these wholesale rates.
Standard Connection Fee. Actual charges passed through from your distributor may vary, see www.amber.com.au/fees for more information
Standard Disconnection Fee. Actual charges passed through from your distributor may vary, see www.amber.com.au/fees for more information
An $3 (inc. GST) fee applies if payment is dishonoured or reversed.
A $16 (inc. GST) fee applies if full payment has not been received by the invoice due date.
A fee of 1% applies to payments made by credit or debit card

electricityContract.terms: Usage charged at the same wholesale electricity costs that are charged to us. If your average bill total over a financial year exceeds the c/kWh maximum annual rate listed below ‘Peak consumption’, then we reduce your bill so that the total does not exceed the maximum rate. You are also protected by Amber’s quarterly price guarantee published on our website. Full terms and conditions at https://www.amber.com.au/terms
electricityContract.variation: Prices are not fixed. All usage is charged at the same wholesale electricity costs that are charged to us. Prices are determined by a range of factors, including government rebates, network fees and wholesale market costs.

eligibility.information: Available to small business customers with estimated imports or exports (whichever is greater) above 50MWh up to 100MWh per year (as calculated quarterly by Amber), in Citipower's distribution region with a demand tariff. For illustrative purposes, tariff CG assumed. Feed-In Tariffs only valid if applicable.

demandCharges.description: Demand component will be billed based on the highest 30-minute KW reading in the maximum demand period for each month and is not based on a rolling 12-month period
Demand component will be billed based on the highest 30-minute KW reading in the maximum demand period for each month and is not based on a rolling 12-month period
Demand component will be billed based on the highest 30-minute KW reading in the maximum demand period for each month and is not based on a rolling 12-month period

solarFeedInTariff.description: Solar FiT c/kWh exported (incl. GST if applicable)

electricityContract.onExpiryDescription: No lock in contracts or exit fees.
